The parameters for creating the properties of a webhook.

___customHeaders.description: Custom headers that will be added to the webhook notifications.

___status.description: The status of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

___actions.description: The list of actions that trigger the webhook to post notifications.

___scope.description: The scope of repositories where the event can be triggered. For example, 'foo:*' means events for all tags under repository 'foo'. 'foo:bar' means events for 'foo:bar' only. 'foo' is equivalent to 'foo:latest'. Empty means all events.

___serviceUri.description: The service URI for the webhook to post notifications.
